abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Development Banking Project
            will provide, through participating DFCs, equity and term
            financing to industrial companies for the development of
            productive facilities and resources in Ecuador in a manner
            designed to strengthen the development banking system and to
            contribute to the improvement of Ecuador's capital market.
